name: Drift Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Drift Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Drift API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Drift API | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: contact

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Custom Attributes (值: getCustomAttributes) - Get custom attributes

email.name: email
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: The email of the contact | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: name (值: None) - The name of the contact
phone (值: None) - The phone number associated with the contact

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact ID | 作用: Unique identifier for the contact | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: email (值: None) - The email of the contact
name (值: None) - The name of the contact
phone (值: None) - The phone number associated with the contact
